players.name: Alice
memory: Bob: "I found out that Alice is the mafioso. Keep an eye on her."
You: "I have nothing to lose by confessing my actions from Night 1. I killed Diana out of necessity as the mafioso. However, I assure you all that I did not kill Bob during the night."
Charlie: "I am innocent and I was not the one who killed Diana. Bob's accusation is false, and I suggest we investigate him further."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob

players.name: Bob

Charlie: "I am innocent and I was not the one who killed Diana. Bob's accusation is false, and I suggest we investigate him further."
